Network does not provide date and time information. Go to Date and time settings to set manually
Select time zone before setting time
Notification
Unable to adjust volume while all sound is off. You can turn on sound by going to accessibility settings
To lower your risk of hearing damage, do not listen at high volumes for long periods
Done
Customizable key
You can use this key to quickly access a function on your phone that you choose. Would you like to select the function for this key now?
Assign
Do not show again
No network connection
Unable to connect to mobile networks while Airplane mode is enabled. Connect to Wi-Fi network instead, or disable Airplane mode and try again

Disable Airplane mode

Mobile data is disabled. Enable mobile data and try again

Data roaming is disabled. Enable data roaming and try again

Mobile data disabled
